column1: in memory of myra hunter hobbs -- miller funeral home| myra hunter hobbs. october 27
column13: elizabeth city. mrs. hobbs was born in perquimans county on october 27
column15: and was the daughter of the late watson herbert and isa dail hunter. known by many in her community for her work as a seamstress
column16: she and her husband had also owned and operated hobbs grocery store in south mills for many years. she was a member of fellowship baptist church. in addition to her parents
column17: she was preceded in death by her husband
column21: and by two brothers. surviving are her daughter
column22: jennifer h. lemon and husband phillip of australia; a son
column23: joey hobbs and wife terry of elizabeth city; a sister
column24: jean jackson of oklahoma; five grandchildren and six great-grandchildren. graveside services will be held sunday at 2:00 p. m. in memory gardens cemetery
column29: is handling arrangements. online condolences may be made by visiting www. millerfhc. com.
